abstract: Some of the country’s largest banks are scaling back a plan to calm the debt markets, making the new superfund look increasingly irrelevant.
snippet: Some of the country’s largest banks are scaling back a plan to calm the debt markets, making the new superfund look increasingly irrelevant.
lead_paragraph: Some of the country’s largest banks are scaling back a plan set in motion by the Treasury Department to shore up troubled investment vehicles and calm the debt markets.

headline.main: Big Banks Scale Back Plan to Aid in Debt Crisis
headline.print_headline: Big Banks Scale Back Plan to Aid In Debt Crisis
